constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: SB1  South of the Borough
NEIGH Name: South of the Borough
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 2no front rooflights and a side gable window to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
A future submission will need to provide details of x2 short-stay cycle spaces for visitors, in accordance with Policy T5 of the London Plan 2021.

Fee required - Lawful Development Certificate applications are different to applications for planning permission and therefore do not qualify for a free go. The fee required for your application is Â£206. Payment can be made online via the Kingston council website, via our Contact Centre on 020 8547 5002, or by cheque made payable to Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames.
